item.title: Importing Data in Python II
item.description: All figures in this blog are embedded by Github Image Hosting Service. These figures may not be displayed on mobile devices. [toc]

item.title: Importing Data in Python I
item.description: All figures in this blog are embedded by Github Image Hosting Service. These figures may not be displayed on mobile devices. [toc] 1. Importing data from flat files We’ll discuss how to import data from 3 kind of data sources flat files such as dot txts and dot csvs; files native to other software such as Excel spreadsheets, Stata, SAS and MATLAB files; relational databases such as SQLite & PostgreSQL.
